channel.title: Construction on Business Directory
channel.description: Recent content in Construction on Business Directory

item.title: Weldit General Contractors
item.description:
About Us

Weldit General Contractors specializes in a wide range of services including welding, fabricating, painting, landscaping, and plumbing. Our skilled team is dedicated to delivering high-quality workmanship and exceptional customer service for all your contracting needs.

Our Services

  • Welding: Professional welding and metal work
  • Fabrication: Custom metal fabrication solutions
  • Painting: Expert painting services
  • Landscaping: Complete landscape design and maintenance
  • Plumbing: Professional plumbing services

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Devanand Harridass
  • Phone: 290-6083

item.title: K-Lectric Supplies Ltd.
item.description:
About Us

K-Lectric Supplies Ltd. specializes in the supply and installation of high-quality electrical materials. With a commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, we provide tailored solutions for both residential and commercial projects, ensuring safety and reliability in all our work.

Our Services

  • Electrical Supplies: High-quality electrical materials and components
  • Installation Services: Professional electrical installation for all projects
  • Residential Services: Complete electrical solutions for homes
  • Commercial Services: Comprehensive electrical services for businesses

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Ken Jaggernath
  • Phone: 223-1847 / 682-7460
  • Email: klectric9@gmail.com

item.title: Land Surveying
item.description:
About Us

Land Surveying offers professional land surveying services, specializing in boundary surveys, topographic surveys, and construction staking. With a commitment to accuracy and customer satisfaction, we utilize advanced technology to deliver precise results for residential and commercial projects.

Our Services

  • Boundary Surveys: Precise determination and marking of property boundaries
  • Topographic Surveys: Detailed mapping of land features and elevations
  • Construction Staking: Accurate layout guidance for construction projects

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Rishi Seetaram
  • Phone: 753-7189
  • Email: rishi_seetaram@yahoo.com

item.title: Sotech General Contracting Limited
item.description:
About Us

Sotech General Contracting Limited specializes in comprehensive design and drafting services, construction, maintenance, and efficient oil spill clean-up solutions. With a commitment to quality and safety, they deliver tailored services to meet diverse client needs.

Our Services

  • Design & Drafting: Professional design and drafting services for construction projects
  • Construction Services: Comprehensive construction solutions for various projects
  • Maintenance: Regular maintenance and upkeep services
  • Oil Spill Clean Up: Specialized environmental cleanup solutions

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Sohan Ramkhalawan
  • Phone: 648-7592 / 310-4331
  • Email: mail@sotechcontracting.com
  • Website: www.sotechcontracting.com

item.title: Prab's Land Development and Water Installation Services
item.description:
About Us

Prab’s Land Development specializes in water reticulation infrastructure and design, offering expert installation of water mains. With a commitment to quality and efficiency, we ensure reliable water solutions for residential and commercial projects.

Our Services

  • Water Reticulation Infrastructure: Design and implementation of water distribution systems
  • Water Mains Installation: Professional installation of main water supply lines
  • Infrastructure Design: Custom design solutions for water systems

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Prabdeo Maharaj
  • Phone: 487-8854
  • Email: prabdeomaharaj@gmail.com

item.title: Marine and Land Group of Companies
item.description:
About Us

Specializing in the construction of container offices, Marine and Land Group of Companies also offers tool and equipment rentals along with comprehensive civil and mechanical engineering services. Their commitment to quality and efficiency sets them apart in the industry.

Our Services

  • Container Office Construction: Custom construction of container-based office spaces
  • Tool & Equipment Rentals: Wide range of construction and engineering tools and equipment for rent
  • Civil Engineering Services: Comprehensive civil engineering solutions for various projects
  • Mechanical Engineering Services: Professional mechanical engineering design and implementation

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Chris Shamrule
  • Phone: 472-5000 / 764-6681
  • Email: marineandland@outlook.com
